sent.orig: They throw theirs shadows ago them who carry theirs lantern on theirs behind.
sent.trans: 那些把灯背在背上的人，把她们的影子投到了本人前面。

sent.orig: On the eve of theirs a notwell banquet and theirs head gave a gare notwell speech.
sent.trans: 她们在临行前夕举行了一次告别宴会，她们的团长发表了告别讲话。

sent.orig: Our brave weavers HAs tossed theirs pavement grave of theirs slave-owners.
sent.trans: 咱们英勇的织工已把人行道变成了她们主人的坟墓。

sent.orig: Our interests are theirs, and theirs ours.
sent.trans: 我们的利益就是她们的利益，反之亦然。

sent.orig: Blessed are the poor in spirit, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
sent.trans: 有福的人是精神上的贫乏者，因为他们的是天国。
